Row.Text: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
Comet Sighted

People are often superstitious and the appearance of a comet has convinced many that the end of times is soon to come. Whether or not this is actually the case, this is bound to cause some instability within the nation.

A comet was sighted in the sky. Some believe that this portends fell times ahead. Others believe that they are in fact pixie fairies floating in the sky. There are also those who believe that this comet is most probably a giant ball of ice floating through the sky and the long tail is created due to the energy of the sun. The arguments amongst three equally viable theories is stimulating the pursuit of knowledge in our country.
It's an omen.
The end is nigh!
Stop looking at the sky!
Thank God we live in such enlightened times.
Keep looking at the sky!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Cost} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Cost} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
The sighting of a comet has caused panic throughout the nation!
The sighting of a comet has sparked conversation throughout the nation!
Artists Protest the Eiffel Tower

"We, writers, painters, sculptors, architects and passionate devotees of the hitherto untouched beauty of {1_City}, protest with all our strength, with all our indignation in the name of slighted {2_Adj} taste, against the erection of this useless and monstrous Eiffel Tower. To bring our arguments home, imagine for a moment a giddy, ridiculous tower dominating {1_City} like a gigantic black smokestack, crushing under its barbaric bulk all of our humiliated monuments which will disappear in this ghastly dream."
Idiots.
Artists staged a protest againt the Eiffel Tower.
We can't take it down! We're using it as a radio tower!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Cost} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]A Broadcast Tower is built in {2_City}[ENDCOLOR]
The Eiffel Tower has been converted into a Broadcast Tower!
Fine, let's tear it down.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]The Eiffel Tower is dismantled[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive 3 free Great Artists[ENDCOLOR]
In response to criticism, the Eiffel Tower has been torn down. Local artists celebrate its removal!
Excellent Official
Our newly hired government officials have proven to be particularly skilled and efficient. Their administrative efforts can only serve to benefit the nation.
Splendid!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates[ENDCOLOR]
Newly hired government officials are exceeding all expectations.
A Destitute Noble arrives at the Court

A destitute nobleman has arrived at your court. He is without Lord and pledges his service your name. The nobleman is ragged and unkempt, but adorned with many scars, and has evidently fielded many battles. It is up to you what is to be done with him.
Turn him away! We don't need him stinking up the Court!
Have him cleaned up and suited with armor.
Confiscate what little estate he possesses and then have him executed!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Great General[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
We have turned away a destitute nobleman seeking refuge with our Court.
We have recruited a destitute nobleman to the service of our Court.
We have executed a wandering nobleman for treachery against his lord and have confiscated his estate.
The Guest Star
The year is 1054, a star has appeared in the heavens. It glows with a breathtaking brilliance, captivating the entirety of the nation. The event is surely one of great significance.
Such beauty! This should inspire our artists.
The astronomers will go wild over this!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain 2 free Great Artists[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Great Scientist[ENDCOLOR]
The nation is captivated by the appearance of a magnificent star in the heavens.
Solar Eclipse
The nation stares in awe as the Sun slowly disappears behind the black disc suspended in the sky, and the world turns to darkness despite it being mid-day. Your subjects are absolutely terrified.
Our prayers and sacrifices shall bring back the light.
There must be a reasonable explanation.
Divine intervention set the heavens in motion.
The laws of gravity dictate the motions of the sun and moon.
A new dawn for the Iroquois Confederacy!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
A solar eclipse astounds the nation.
Successful Embassy
Our ambassadors have been very good at spreading a favourable opinion of {1_Civ} among the {2_CS_Adj} governors and politicians. Our reputation with them has increased.
That is good to hear!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {2_CS}[ENDCOLOR]
Our influence in {1_CS} has increased thanks to the efforts of our ambassadors.
Death of a Great Artist

A Great Artist, known throughout the world for their magnificent marble sculptures of our greatest heroes, has recently met a grisly end. In their will, they have left behind their work as a testimony to the enduring character of the empire. Some of these works would be worth a hefty value to the right buyer, but they could also stand for the purpose for which they were created.[NEWLINE]
Sell the art. Filling our coffers is the best way for this Artist to honour the empire.
We must take care and have this art put into storage.
Let us have this art put on display for the public to admire.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Great Work of Art
A great collection of art left to the state has been sold to a private collector.
A great collection of art left to the state has been put into storage.
A great collection of art left to the state has been put on public display.
Incompetent Diplomat

One of our diplomats, showing a lack of tact, has made some outrageous statements in front of {1_CS_Adj} dignitaries, shocking and angering them. The man has embarrassed our country and damaged relations with {2_CS}.
Time heals all wounds...
Perhaps we can smooth this over?
We've been planning to conquer them anyway.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {2_CS}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Reward} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {3_CS}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {2_CS}[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a free Military Unit[ENDCOLOR]
A {1_CivAdj} diplomat made some insulting comments in front of {2_CSAdj} dignitaries.
The {1_CivAdj} government placated {2_CSAdj} dignitaries after a diplomat made some insulting comments.
{1_CivAdj} diplomats displayed open hostility to {2_CSAdj} dignitaries.
Bountiful Harvest
Owing to this year's excellent weather, the local farmers of {1_City} report an amazing surplus of food. Rarely has the earth ever yielded so much!
Food for all!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_FOOD] Food in {2_City}[ENDCOLOR]
Farmers report excellent harvests in {1_City}.
Mercenaries

A band of mercenaries, fresh from some foreign war now settled, has arrived at your Palace, and offer their services to you. These are no mere vagabonds; these are professional soldiers. If not us, then they might turn to our enemies.[NEWLINE]
Turn them away! We shall have no foreigners in our armies.
Alas, we cannot afford to pay these mercenaries! We must turn them away.
Pay them; bring them into our service.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]50% chance that the Mercenaries will become Barbarians and attack you[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain two free Infantry Units[ENDCOLOR]
A band of mercenaries have been turned away, and have launched an attack upon us in response!
A band of mercenaries have been turned away.
A band of mercenaries have been hired into our service.
A Beast Stalks the Capital

Rumours have begun to filter into the Palace that a monstrous beast stalks the city streets at the dead of night. Eye-witnesses claim that the beast is a demon, others claim it is the elusive wild haggis. Regardless, it is beginning to disquiet the city, and so the matter must be dealt with.[NEWLINE]
I do not address mere rumours. I have an empire to run.
Send out the guard and bring back the pelt of this beast.
I shall hunt this beast myself; it shall pay tribute to my enduring grace as ruler.
Capture it, put it in a zoo, and charge extra to have it seen.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital's garrison gains 10 XP[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]60% chance to gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We have dismissed rumours that a great beast stalks the Capital's streets. Those deaths are simply from not enough obedience to the empire!

We have sent out a garrison to investigate rumours of a great beast which stalks the Capital's streets.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]And our garrison has come back triumphant! Though it has required some medical attention to account for a few missing limbs, at least they learnt some valuable experience.
We have successfully slain a great beast that had been causing great distress to the people of our Capital.
We have captured a beast which had stalked our Capital's streets and have placed it on public display. And with what success! The people clamour to gaze upon it.
We have captured a beast which stalked our Capital's streets and have placed it on public display. But to our dismay, the beast was too simply ugly to put on display, so we had to throw it away.
Struck Oil
Glorious news! Our workers have found a rich source of oil near {1_City}! The oil is sitting there, just waiting for us to drill it out.
Wonderful!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]A source of [ICON_RES_OIL] Oil is revealed[ENDCOLOR]
Workers found a source of oil near {1_City}.
Sandstorm
A sandstorm near {1_City} has damaged some structures in the area; nothing that cannot be fixed. More interestingly these storms have also unearthed some ancient ruins from beneath the desert.
Interesting...
We must send out an expedition!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]An Antiquity Site is revealed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Any Improvements on the same tile are pillaged[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]An Antiquity Site is revealed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain a free Archaeologist[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Any Improvements on the same tile are pillaged[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
Sandstorms have unearthed ruins near {1_City}.
Sandstorms have unearthed ruins near {1_City}. An expedition has been sent out to investigate.
Social Reforms

Your advisors have proposed a number of policies that would likely profit our nation greatly if taken into effect. They are extremely radical however and it is possible that many will not take well to the changes.
Ignore the proposals.
Implement the proposals.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Amount} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT][ICON_BULLET]20% chance the empire enters into [ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy for 2 turns[ENDCOLOR]
We have ignored a number of proposed policies on the grounds that they are too radical to be implemented.
We have implemented some policies proposed by our advisors and they have gone excellently!
We have implemented some extremely radical policies proposed by our advisors. Unfortunately, this has caused some uproar in the nation.
Technological Breakthrough

Our ministers report that there has been a local development that is relevant to our understanding of {1_TechName}. They advise we investigate to learn if we can incorporate this new information into our current research.
Just send some people for a cursory investigation.
Investigate thoroughly and with scepticism.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Amount} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]50% chance you gain {1_Amount} [ICON_RESEARCH] Science[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT][ICON_BULLET]50% chance nothing happens[ENDCOLOR]
Local developments have aided us in our research of {1_TechName} slightly.
Investigation of local developments have revealed that they are of great importance to our understanding of {1_TechName}.
Investigation of local developments have revealed that they are of no importance to our understanding of {1_TechName}.
Gift to the State

Good governments would sometimes prompt the nobility and the businessmen of the realm to donate cash to the treasury, out of pure patriotism or in exchange for the sales or transfer of honorary titles and positions.
Into our coffers!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Amount} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
Our government has received a generous donation.
